alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:29PM CST until January 29 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts up to 12 inches across the higher peaks of the mountains. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Sevier Smoky Mountains and Blount Smoky Mountains Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 1 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strong winds combined with the fresh snowfall will produce widespread blowing and drifting of snow, especially across the higher elevations. Visibilities will be reduced to near zero at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
